'''Jabberwock's Holy Sword''' is a Quest Item obtained during the {{Quest|Ann's Story}}.

It is replaced by the [[Holy Blade of Narzissenkreuz]] during the very same quest.

==Trivia==
* The name of this sword is a reference to the Vorpal Blade from ''{{w|Jabberwocky}}'', a poem included in ''{{w|Through the Looking-Glass}}'' by {{w|Lewis Carroll}}.
